Specimen Type: Formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded (FFPE) tissue sections or alcohol-fixed cytology smears
Purpose: To perform immunohistochemical staining for CD163 to produce stained slides for diagnostic evaluation.
Container: Formalin-fixed tissue block or positively charged microscope slide
Equipment: Microtome, water bath, slide warmer, staining racks/Coplin jars, automated or manual immunostainer, microscope
